title: TrackHub Schema v.1.0
description: The schema which describes valid TrackHub track database JSON documents.

version.description: The version of the JSON track database document.

trackdb.description: The URL of the original trackDb file, in case the JSON has been created from it.

species.title: The organism/species of this collection of tracks.

assembly.title: Assembly
assembly.description: Information which identifies the assembly referred to by this set of tracks.

accession.title: NCBI Assembly accession ID
accession.description: The NCBI assembly identifier (accession and version)

data.title: Track metadata
data.description: Contains metadata for a collection of tracks defined in the TrackHub. Each track metadata has an id attribute which is used as a property key to fetch the corresponding configuration in the configuration object.

configuration.title: Track configuration
configuration.description: Contains display and configuration properties for the tracks specified in the data object.

track_configuration.title: Track display and configuration properties.
track_configuration.description: Contains display and configuration properties for all track types.
